game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Uncover the secrets of the ancient city of Eldarath.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost city deep within the nearby forest, filled with treasures and artifacts from a long-forgotten civilization. Your mission is to explore the ruins, gather as much information as possible, and return with any valuable relics you may find.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting resistance to dark magic, 1000 gold pieces, and a boost in reputation among the city's inhabitants.
game.quest-giver: Thorold Silvermist, a renowned archaeologist and historian.

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the lost city.
task.description: Make your way through the forest, following the map provided by Thorold Silvermist. Be cautious of wild beasts and potential traps set by ancient guardians.
task.location: The heart of the nearby forest.

task.objective: Decipher the ancient texts within the city's central library.
task.description: Navigate through the ruins, avoiding deadly traps and puzzles. Once you reach the central library, study the ancient texts to uncover clues about the city's downfall and potential treasures.

task.objective: Retrieve a powerful artifact from the depths of the city's dungeon.
task.description: Venture into the treacherous dungeon, fighting off fearsome creatures and overcoming obstacles. Retrieve the artifact, said to grant immense power to its wielder.
